docs.title: Welcome to the Orange cloudavenue opensource portal
docs.text: This is the main page of the Orange cloudavenue opensource portal. Here you will find all the information you need to get started with the Orange cloudavenue opensource project.

docs.title: What is Orange cloudavenue ?
docs.text: Orange cloudavenue is an infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) public cloud offer. More information on the Orange cloudavenue website (French link).

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
• Terraform Validators

    Validators is an plugin for Terraform Framework. These validators are used to validate the configuration of the Terraform resources.

    Documentation

  • Terraform PlanModifiers

    PlanModifiers is an plugin for Terraform Framework. These PlanModifiers are used to modify the Terraform plan.

    Documentation

  • Terraform SuperSchema

    SuperSchema is an plugin for Terraform Framework. SuperSchema allows you to write the Terraform schema for resources and datasources in a single definition.

    Documentation

  • Terraform SuperTypes

    SuperTypes is an plugin for Terraform Framework. The supertypes are custom types that are used to extend the functionality of the Terraform Plugin Framework.

  • Kube Image Updater

    Kubernetes Image Updater is a kubernetes operator with custom resource definition (CRD) that allows you to define the image update strategy and schedule.

    Documentation
